# Get Bulk Job Info

# Description

Retrieve the status, processed records information of a bulk upload or bulk
                download/query job by providing the job ID.

# Project compatibility

Windows | Cross-platform

# Configuration

* 
* Job ID - The ID of the bulk job. This field supports String type input.
* Job type - Select the job type from the available drop-down list: Bulk Upload or Bulk Download.





* Get bulk job info - Automatically generated output variable.
